description: Country code of the patent office.
name: country_code

description: Indicates the origin of the patentee data (PC: patentcity, WGP25: Worldwide Geocoding of Patent - slot 25, WGP45: Worldwide Geocoding of Patent - slot 45, EXP: expansion ).
name: origin

fields.description: True if the patentee is an inventor, else False.
fields.name: is_inv

fields.description: True if the patentee is an assignee, else False.
fields.name: is_asg

fields.description: Formatted address lines built out of the parsed address components.
fields.name: loc_addressLines

fields.description: Assembled address value for displaying purposes.
fields.name: loc_locationLabel

fields.description: First subdivision level(s) below the country. Where commonly used, this is a state code (for instance, CA for California).
fields.name: loc_state

fields.description: Second subdivision level(s) below the country. Use of this field is optional if a second subdivision level is not available.
fields.name: loc_county

fields.description: Subdivision level below the city. Use of this field is optional if a second subdivision level is not available.
fields.name: loc_district

fields.description: Subdivision level below the district. Used only for India.
fields.name: loc_subdistrict

fields.description: Indicates the relevance of the results found; the higher the score the more relevant the alternative. The score is a normalized value between 0 and 1.
fields.name: loc_relevance

fields.description: Quality of the location match. pointAddress: Location matches exactly as point address. interpolated: Location was interpolated.
fields.name: loc_matchType

fields.description: Code indicating how well the result matches the request. Enumeration [exact, ambiguous, upHierarchy, ambiguousUpHierarchy].
fields.name: loc_matchCode

fields.description: The most detailed address field that matched the input record.
fields.name: loc_matchLevel

fields.description: MatchQuality provides detailed information about the match quality of a result at attribute level. Match quality is a value between 0.0 and 1.0. 1.0 represents a 100% match. Here, matchQuality is defined at country level.
fields.name: loc_matchQualityCountry

fields.description: Key used for statistical area mapping (internal use).
fields.name: loc_key

fields.description: Name of the high level Statistical Area.
fields.name: loc_statisticalArea1

fields.description: Code of the high level Statistical Area.
fields.name: loc_statisticalArea1Code

fields.description: Name of the mid level Statistical Area.
fields.name: loc_statisticalArea2

fields.description: Code of the mid level Statistical Area.
fields.name: loc_statisticalArea2Code

fields.description: Name of the low level Statistical Area.
fields.name: loc_statisticalArea3

fields.description: Code of the low level Statistical Area.
fields.name: loc_statisticalArea3Code

fields.description: Identifier of the input address in the response.
fields.name: loc_recId

fields.description: Number of results for the corresponding input record.
fields.name: loc_seqLength

fields.description: Consecutively numbers the different results for the corresponding input record starting with 1.
fields.name: loc_seqNumber

fields.description: True if a patentee with the 'same' name has been detected in the same patent. Only one of the two is marked as duplicate.
fields.name: is_duplicate
